enhanced_by.reason: The add method operates on an IndexedCollection, which can be initialized using the nonUniqueIndexedCollection method.
The add method operates on an IndexedCollection, which can be initialized using the uniqueIndexedCollection method.
The add method calls addToIndex to update the index, making it a good candidate for assertions related to index updates.
The add method affects the state of the collection, which can be verified using the contains method to check if the added element is present.
The add method affects the index, which can be verified using the get method to retrieve the added element by its key.
